Package hydra.ext.org.stacspec.items

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RelationType.PartialVisitor<R>  
    RelationType.Visitor<R>  
    Role.PartialVisitor<R>  
    Role.Visitor<R>  
    StacRelationType.PartialVisitor<R>  
    StacRelationType.Visitor<R>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Asset
    An Asset is an object that contains a URI to data associated with the Item that can be downloaded or streamed.
    Item
    This object describes a STAC Item.
    Link
    This object describes a relationship with another entity.
    MediaType  
    RelationType
    STAC Items use a variety of rel types in the link object, to describe the exact nature of the link between this Item and the entity it is linking to.
    RelationType.Iana  
    RelationType.Other  
    RelationType.Stac  
    Role
    The roles field is used to describe the purpose of each asset.
    Role.Data
    The data itself.
    Role.Metadata
    A metadata sidecar file describing the data in this Item, for example the Landsat-8 MTL file.
    Role.Other  
    Role.Overview
    An asset that represents a possibly larger view than the thumbnail of the Item, for example, a true color composite of multi-band data.
    Role.Thumbnail
    An asset that represents a thumbnail of the Item, typically a true color image (for Items with assets in the visible wavelengths), lower-resolution (typically smaller 600x600 pixels), and typically a JPEG or PNG (suitable for display in a web browser).
    StacRelationType  
    StacRelationType.Collection
    STRONGLY RECOMMENDED.
    StacRelationType.DerivedFrom
    URL to a STAC Item that was used as input data in the creation of this Item.
    StacRelationType.Parent
    URL to the parent STAC entity (Catalog or Collection).
    StacRelationType.Root
    URL to the root STAC entity (Catalog or Collection).
    StacRelationType.Self
    STRONGLY RECOMMENDED.
    StacVersion  
    Uri  
    Url
